name: The Traveller (georgejj5)
description:
This project was created with the idea of helping in the rehabilitation of people with cognitive problems.

It is based on a series of mini-games provided by VITHAS experts and with the option to create users for the different patients, it is also possible to choose the level of difficulty for each mini-game.

 All this information is stored in a database.It is a university project done by a group of 13 students, where I fitted in the database and the Katamino mini-game.
